quest.name: [Dungeon] Test Your Might
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:25000001$ Entrance: $map:2000217$
$npc:11001179$ has heard that $map:2000325$ is an excellent place to hone your combat skills. It just so happens that there are unique monsters dwelling there that $npc:11001179$ is curious about. If you could help with his research, he would be very grateful.

quest.name: [Dungeon] Temporal Economics
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:21008001$ Entrance: $map:2000259$ Party Size (4 People)
$npc:11001179$ has heard there is a time machine being developed in $map:2000298$. He was ecstatic at the thought of being the first commercial time machine vendor.
Travel to $map:2000298$ and discovered whether someone really has invented a time machine!

quest.name: [Dungeon] Shaved Ice
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:20001001$ Entrance: $map:2000183$ Party Size: 4 This quest is only available on normal difficulty.
$npc:11001179$ heard that a particular Vayarian who disappeared long ago has reappeared at $map:02000321$. Rumor has it, there are mysterious ice shards on $npc:23100006$'s body which hold the power to cure diseases.
You should travel to $map:2000321$ in $map:2000183$ and unearth the truth about $npc:23100006$.

quest.name: [Dungeon] Aah... Fuzzy Monsters!
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:20015001$ Entrance: $map:2000175$ Party Size: 4 This quest is only available on normal difficulty.
$npc:11001179$ has heard that $npc:23100033$'s fur is extremely soft. However, due to $npc:23100033$'s aggressiveness, their fur is very hard to come by.
Ever profit-driven, $npc:11001179$ is determined to commercialize their fur. Still... if it is as fuzzy as rumored, it might be nice to get a few handfuls to rub your face into. Go to $map:02000322$ in $map:2000175$, and find out firsthand!

quest.name: [Dungeon] Dark Implications
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:21014001$ Entrance: $map:02010047$ Party Size: 4 This quest is only available on normal difficulty.
Ever looking for the competitive advantage, $npc:11001179$ is contemplating the use of dark magic in lifting heavy objects. He wants to be sure that it's safe, and asks you to track down and investigate $npc:24002005$'s mental state.
Harnessing dark magics just to get ahead seems a little much, but a job's a job. Go to $map:02010054$ in $map:02010047$ and study $npc:24002005$'s to determine if using dark magic is safe.

quest.name: Dungeon: Mutant Block Golem
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:02000346$ (Entrance: $map:02000003$)
$npc:11001179$ recently watched a documentary on Maple TV that was about certain anomalies in various ecosystems. One particular anomaly that caught his attention was about a strange block golem that appeared in an area where water was solidifying into a land comprised of Ludibrium blocks for some unknown reason. Although most people were worried about the odd phenomenon of water solidifying into a block, $npc:11001179$ was excited at having the opportunity of finding and repairing the block golem itself, so that it could be sold as toys to children. Although this seems like a fool's errand, I suppose it wouldn't hurt to go to $map:02000346$ at $map:02000003$ as he requested, and see for myself if $npc:24001603$ can be repaired.

quest.name: Dungeon: Mutant Cactus
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:02000347$ (Entrance: $map:02000045$)
$npc:11001179$ recently watched a documentary on Maple TV that was about certain anomalies in various ecosystems. One particular anomaly that caught his attention was about a red cactus that appeared for some unknown reason. Although most people were worried about such an odd phenomenon occurring, $npc:11001179$ was excited at the prospect of subduing the cactus' aggressiveness and selling it as a decorative plant. Although this seems like a fool's errand, I suppose it wouldn't hurt to go to $map:02000347$ at $map:02000045$ as he requested, and see if $npc:24001604$ can be tamed and used as a decorative plant.

quest.name: Dungeon: Mutant Little Devil
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:02000348$ (Entrance: $map:02000010$)
$npc:11001179$ recently watched a documentary on Maple TV that was about certain anomalies in various ecosystems. One particular anomaly that caught his attention was about an evil Little Devil that appeared for some unknown reason. $npc:11001179$'s trading business with the mine, the location where the Little Devil appeared, has come to grinding halt due to the presence of the monster. Let's go to $map:02000347$ at $map:02000045$ as he requested, and defeat $npc:24001605$.

quest.name: Dungeon: A Cute Yet Horrible Box
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:02000344$ (Entrance: $map:02000255$) Party Size (4 players)
$npc:11001179$ recently watched a documentary on Maple TV that was about certain anomalies in various ecosystems. One particular anomaly that caught his attention was about a toy that turned into a terrifying monster for some unknown reason. Although most people were worried about such an odd phenomenon occurring, $npc:11001179$ was excited at the prospect of preventing the monster's transformation to sell it as a toy to children. Although this sounds like a difficult task, I should still go to $map:02000344$ at $map:02000255$ as he requested, and see if $npc:24001601$ can be fixed and sold as a toy.

quest.name: Dungeon: Deadly Kiss
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:02000345$ (Entrance: $map:02000007$) Party Size (4 players)
$npc:11001179$ recently watched a documentary on Maple TV that was about certain anomalies in various ecosystems. One particular anomaly that caught his attention was about a queen chess piece transforming into a deadly, yet attractive, monster. Although most people were worried about such an odd phenomenon occurring, $npc:11001179$ was excited at the prospect of changing the monster back into an adorable toy by vanquishing its evil aura, so that it could be sold as a children's toy. Although this sounds like a difficult task, I should still go to $map:02000345$ at $map:02000007$ as he requested, and see if $npc:24001602$ can be purified.

quest.name: Socketed Fashion
quest.desc: Apprentice $npc:11001612$ of the Victoria Design Association is teaching adventurers about outfit sockets. You should go and learn more!

quest.name: Fashion Deconstructed
quest.desc: $npc:11001612$ is giving a special class on outfit sockets. You should go listen.

quest.name: The Empire Gives Back
quest.desc: $npc:11000119$ tells you that empress $npcName:11000075$ has prepared a gift for you, and instructs you to visit $npc:11000005$ in $map:02000031$ to claim it. It would be rude to refuse a gift from the empress!

quest.name: About Lumistones
quest.desc: $npcName:11000005$, the head of $map:02000001$ library, is holding a lumistone for you that was prepared as a gift by empress $npcName:11000075$. Go visit them.

quest.name: Winter Is Coming
quest.desc: $npc:11000596$, whom I met in $map:02000103$, was jumping up and down to try to fight off the cold. Because fairies are more prone to the cold compared to humans, they are in greater need of warm clothing. But human fabric is too heavy for fairies. The truth is, fairies use the rare $item:30000177$ to make all of their clothes! $npcName:11000596$ has worked diligently to collect the fluff needed to make some warm clothing, but they all disappeared. $map:02000103$'s $npc:21000239$ used to be completely black, but has been slowly turning white ever since the fluff disappeared. $npc:11000596$ thinks that $npc:21000239$ stole the $item:30000177$ away... Thought seemingly reluctant, $npc:11000596$ gave me a rather detailed explanation. It's obvious from $npc:11000596$'s pleading eyes that my help is desperately needed.

quest.name: 안경은 어디에
quest.desc: 시력이 엄청 나쁜 $npc:11000595$$pp:는,은$ 간밤에 책상 위에 둔 안경이 없어졌다며, 주변에 안경이 떨어져 있는지 살펴봐 달라고 했다. 혹시 떨어져 있을지도 모르는 안경을 밟지 않도록 조심하며 주변을 살펴보자.

quest.name: メガネはいずこに
quest.desc: 視力が非常に悪い$npc:11000595$は昨夜、机の上に置いておいたメガネがなくなったと言い、 この辺にメガネが落ちていないか調べてほしいと頼んだ。落ちているかもしれないメガネを踏まないように用心しながら周辺を調べよう。

quest.name: 요정 러프를 찾아서
quest.desc: 안경은 없었지만 안경이 그려진 $npc:11000597$$pp:를,을$ 발견했다. 메모에 대해 말을 꺼내기가 무섭게 $npc:11000677$$pp:가,이$ 안경을 가져간 것을 확신하는 $npc:11000595$. 안경은 가져가면 안된다고 $npcName:11000677$에게 여러 번 이야기 했는데도 자꾸 가져간다는데… 안경이 없으면 아무것도 보이지 않는 $npc:11000595$$pp:를,을$ 위해서 $npcName:11000677$$pp2:로,으로$부터 그의 안경을 찾아오자. $map:02000320$ 입구는 $map:02000103$ 꼭대기에 있는 $npc:11000598$ 뒤에 숨겨져 있다고 한다.

quest.name: 妖精ラフを探して
quest.desc: メガネは見つからなかったが、メガネが描いてある$npc:11000597$は見つかった。メモの話を切り出すや否や、$npc:11000677$がメガネを持ち去ったと確信する$npc:11000595$。メガネはを持っていくなと$npcName:11000677$に何度も注意したのに、それでも聞かないんだとか…。 メガネがなければ何も見えない$npc:11000595$のために、$npcName:11000677$から彼のメガネを回収しよう。 $map:02000320$の入口は$map:02000103$の頂上にある$npc:11000598$の裏に隠されているという。

quest.name: 스콧의 안경을 찾아라
quest.desc: $npc:11000598$$pp:를,을$ 찾았으니 이제 $map:02000320$에 들어가서 $npc:11000677$$pp2:로,으로$부터 $item:30000178$$pp:를,을$ 찾는 일만 남았다. $npc:11000595$$pp:는,은$ 혹시 $npcName:11000677$$pp:가,이$ 겨울잠을 자고 있을지도 모른다고 했다. 잘 때 깨우면 $npcName:11000677$$pp:가,이$ 싫어할지도 모르니, 되도록이면 깨우지 말아달라는 $npc:11000595$의 부탁을 기억하자.

quest.name: スコットのメガネを探せ
quest.desc: $npc:11000598$を見つけた。もう$map:02000320$に入って$npc:11000677$から$item:30000178$を取り返すのみ。 $npc:11000595$は、$npcName:11000677$は今頃冬眠しているかもしれないと言い、睡眠を邪魔されたら$npcName:11000677$が怒るはずだから、なるべく起こすなとアドバイスした。

quest.name: 돌아온 단 한명의 주민
quest.desc: $npc:11000136$$pp:는,은$ 마을의 주민들에게 큰 일이 났다며 다급하게 도움을 요청했다. 며칠 전 $map:02000169$$pp2:로,으로$ 떠난 $map:02000051$ 주민들의 소식이 끊겼는데 그 중 한 명이 마을에 돌아왔다는 것이다. 돌아온 주민의 이름은 $npc:11000696$$pp:다,이다$. 그는 어딘가에 감금 당해있다가 간신히 탈출했다고 한다. 우선 $npc:11000696$$pp:를,을$ 찾아가서 다른 주민들의 행방을 물어보자.

quest.name: 帰ってきた、たった1人の住民
quest.desc: $npc:11000136$は村の住民に大変なことが起きたと言い、助けを求めてきた。 数日前、$map:02000169$に旅立った$map:02000051$の住民たちからの消息が耐えてしまったが、その中の1人が村に帰ってきたというのだ。帰ってきた住民の名は$npc:11000696$。彼はどこかに監禁されていたが、やっとの思いで脱出してきたという。 $npc:11000696$を訪ねて他の住民の行方を聞いてみよう。

quest.name: 광산 소굴 잠입
quest.desc: $npc:11000686$$pp:는,은$ 자물쇠로 굳게 잠겨 있었다. $item:30000137$$pp:는,은$ $npc:22409034$$pp:가,이$ 가지고 있을 거라고 했다. 그런데 $npc:23000034$$pp:는,은$ 한시도 떨어져 있지 않는다고 하니… 우선 $npc:23000034$$pp:를,을$ 떨어트리고 $npc:22409034$에게 $item:30000137$$pp:를,을$ 얻어야 한다. 그 다음 $map:02000230$에 잠입해서 갇혀 있는 $map:02000051$ 주민들을 구출하자. 그리고 이곳에서 주민들을 괴롭히고 있던 $npc:29000032$도 혼내주도록 하자.
quest.manual: $map:02000230$에 들어가서 감금된 페리온 주민들 구출하기|주민들을 괴롭히는 $npc:29000032$ 혼내주기

quest.name: 鉱山の巣窟に潜入
quest.desc: $npc:11000686$は鍵がかかっていた。$item:30000137$は$npc:22409034$が持っているが、$npc:23000034$はずっと一緒にいるという…。まずは$npc:23000034$を離れさせ、$npc:22409034$から$item:30000137$を手に入れなければならない。 その次に$map:02000230$に潜入し、監禁されている$map:02000051$の住民たちを救出しよう。それから、そこで住民たちを苦しめている$npc:29000032$も懲らしめてやろう。
quest.manual: $map:02000230$に入って監禁されたペリオンの住民たちを救出する|住民たちを苦しめる$npc:29000032$を退治する

quest.name: 감금된 주민들
quest.desc: $map:02000051$ 주민들은 원래 구구스와 사이좋게 지내고 있었는데 언제부터인가 $npc:22409034$의 이간질 때문에 구구스와 사이가 틀어졌다. $npc:11000696$$pp:를,을$ 비롯해 평소에 구구스와 친하게 지내던 $map:02000051$ 주민들은 오해를 풀기 위해서 구구스를 찾아 $map:02000169$에 갔지만, $npc:22409034$의 방해로 구구스는 만나지도 못하고 감금 당했던 것이다. $npc:11000696$$pp:는,은$ 운 좋게 도망쳤지만 다른 주민들은 $map:02000230$에 아직 갇혀 있다고 한다. $npc:11000686$$pp:는,은$ $map:02000169$$pp:를,을$ 내려가다 보면 있다고 한다.

quest.name: 監禁された住民たち
quest.desc: $map:02000051$の住民たちは、元々ググスと仲が良かったが、$npc:22409034$による仲違いが原因で疎遠になってしまったという。$npc:11000696$をはじめ、普段からググスと仲良くしていた$map:02000051$の住民たちは、誤解を解くためにググスがいる$map:02000169$へ行ったが、$npc:22409034$に邪魔され、ググスに会えずに監禁されてしまったのだ。 $npc:11000696$は運よく逃げられたが、他の住民たちは今も$map:02000230$に監禁されているという。$npc:11000686$は$map:02000169$を下っていったところにあるという。

quest.name: 마법약 재료가 부족해
quest.desc: 며칠 전, $npc:11000695$$pp:는,은$ 호숫가에서 왕관을 쓴 두꺼비를 발견했는데, $npc:11000695$$pp:는,은$ 그 두꺼비가 마녀의 변신 저주에 걸린 왕자님이 틀림없다고 확신하고 있다. 왕관을 쓴 두꺼비가 정말 저주에 걸린 왕자님인지 아닌지는 알 수 없지만 $npc:11000695$$pp:는,은$ 큰 기대를 하고 있는 것 같다. 곧 마법약이 완성된다며 신나있던 $npc:11000695$$pp:는,은$ 갑자기 비명을 지르더니, 마법약의 재료 중 하나인 $item:30000138$$pp:를,을$ 준비하는 것을 빠트렸다고 한다. 왕관을 쓴 두꺼비가 정말 왕자님인지 아닌지 궁금하기도 하니, 마법약에서 눈을 뗄 수 없는 $npc:11000695$$pp:를,을$ 한 번 도와줄까?

quest.name: 魔法薬の材料が足りない！
quest.desc: 数日前、$npc:11000695$は湖のほとりで王冠をつけたヒキガエルを発見したが、$npc:11000695$はそのヒキガエルが魔女の呪いにかかった王子様で間違いないと確信している。王冠をつけたヒキガエルが本当に呪われた王子様かどうかは分からないが、$npc:11000695$の期待は膨らんでいく一方だ。 もうすぐ魔法薬が完成すると浮かれていた$npc:11000695$は突然悲鳴を上げて魔法薬の材料の1つである$item:30000138$が抜けていたという。 王冠をつけたヒキガエルが本当に王子様かどうかも気になるので、魔法薬の製作で忙しい$npc:11000695$に協力してあげようかな？

quest.name: 변신 저주를 푸는 약
quest.desc: $npc:11000695$$pp:는,은$ 드디어 약이 완성되었다며 기뻐하는 것 같더니 곧 부끄럽다며 얼굴을 붉힌다. 이유를 물어보니 $npc:11000695$$pp:가,이$ 만든 마법약의 사용 방법은 저주에 걸린 대상에게 로션처럼 발라주는 것인데, 두꺼비는 왕관만 쓰고 있지 옷은 입지 않고 있다나… $npc:11000695$$pp:는,은$ 모르겠다며 자신이 만든 마법약을 건네주었다. 왕관을 쓴 두꺼비에게 $item:30000144$$pp:를,을$ 발라주도록 하자.

quest.name: 変身の呪いを解く薬
quest.desc: $npc:11000695$はついに薬が完成したと喜んだが、急に頬を染めた。理由を聞くと、そのヒキガエルは王冠はつけているが、服は着ていないんだとか…。$npc:11000695$が作った魔法薬の使い方はシンプルで、呪いにかかっている対象にローションのように塗ってあげるのみだという。 $npc:11000695$は、魔法薬を使った後のことは知らないと言い、魔法薬を渡してくれた。王冠をつけたヒキガエルに$item:30000144$を塗ってみよう。
quest.manual: $npc:11000695$からもらった$item:30000144$を 王冠をつけたヒキガエルに塗ってあげる

quest.name: 안경 없인 꼼짝 못 해
quest.desc: 안경을 잃어버려 앞이 안 보이는 $npc:11000710$. 발을 헛디딜까봐 다리 앞에서 꼼짝 못 하고 있다. 다리 아래로 떨어진 $item:30000203$$pp:를,을$ 주워 $npc:11000710$에게 가져다주자.

quest.name: メガネがなければ何もできないよ
quest.desc: メガネを失くして何も見えないという$npc:11000710$。足を踏み外しそうで、橋で立ち往生している。橋の下に落ちている$item:30000203$を拾って$npc:11000710$に届けよう。

quest.name: 장작더미 옮기기
quest.desc: 고소공포증으로 인해 다리 건너기를 주저하는 $npc:11000710$. 그냥 건너기도 힘든데, $item:30000207$까지 들고 건너려니 막막하기만 하다. $npc:11000710$$pp:를,을$ 대신해 $item:30000207$$pp:를,을$ 다리 건너편으로 옮겨놓자.

quest.name: 薪の山を移す
quest.desc: 高所恐怖症で橋を渡れずにいる$npc:11000710$。素手でも渡れないのに、$item:30000207$を持ったまま渡れるわけがない。$npc:11000710$の代わりに$item:30000207$を橋の向こうに移そう。
quest.manual: $npc:11000710$周辺の$item:30000207$を橋の向こうに移す

quest.name: 꽃향기에 홀린 마노
quest.desc: 악한 기운의 지배라도 받고 있는 걸까? 꽃을 신주단지 모시듯 하며, 집 밖으로만 나다니는 $npc:22000059$. $npc:22000059$의 부인인 $npc:11000705$$pp:는,은$ 그런 남편이 못 마땅하기만 하다. 오늘도 집 밖으로 나간 $npc:22000059$$pp:를,을$ 찾아, 그에게서 악한 기운을 몰아내자.

quest.name: 花の香りに酔ったマノ
quest.desc: 悪いオーラに操られ、花に異常な執着を見せる$npc:22000059$。$npc:22000059$の妻$npc:11000705$はそんな夫に不満があるようだ。 今日も出かけている$npc:22000059$を探して彼から悪いオーラを払おう。
quest.manual: (エリート) $map:02000113$の$npc:22000059$に付着している悪いオーラを払う

quest.name: 잔디 살리기
quest.desc: 오랜 기간, $map:2000111$$pp:는,은$ 사람들에게 '앞으로는 하얀 모래사장과 푸른 바다가, 뒤편으로는 파란 잔디밭이 펼쳐져 있는 곳!'으로 알려져 왔다. 하지만 근래 들어 $npc:21000025$$pp:와,과$ $npc:21000058$$pp:가,이$ 이곳에 나타나면서 잔디 밭은 엉망이 되었다고 한다. $npc:21000025$$pp:와,과$ $npc:21000058$$pp:를,을$ 몰아내고, $map:2000111$의 아름다운 풍경을 되살리자.

quest.name: 芝生を大切に
quest.desc: $map:2000111$は昔から、「前には白い砂浜と青い海が、後ろには緑の芝生が広がる場所」で有名だった。 しかし、最近$npc:21000025$と$npc:21000058$が現れるようになってから、芝生がめちゃくちゃになったという。 $npc:21000025$と$npc:21000058$を追い出し、$map:2000111$の美しい景色を取り戻そう。

quest.name: 키 크는 꿈
quest.desc: 록펠러 타워 위쪽을 한참 올려다 보는 $npc:11000471$. 높은 곳에서 떨어지는 꿈을 꾸면 키가 큰다는 얘길 듣고는 높은 곳이 궁금해져 록펠러 타워 가장 높은 곳에 올라갔다 왔다고 한다. 높은 곳에서 내려다본 기억을 남기고자 카메라를 들었지만 갑작스레 몰려온 몬스터들 때문에 카메라를 손에서 놓치고 말았다는데…… 잃어버린 카메라 때문에 우울해하는 $npc:11000471$$pp:를,을$ 위해 카메라를 찾아다 주자.
quest.manual: 록펠러 타워 가장 높은 곳에서 $item:30000249$ 구하기

quest.name: 背が伸びる夢
quest.desc: ロックフェラータワーの天辺を見上げている$npc:11000471$。高いところから落ちる夢を見れば背が伸びるという話を聞き、気になってロックフェラータワーの最上階に上ったという。しかし、高いところから見下ろす景色を記憶に残すためにカメラを構えたが、突然モンスターに襲われ、カメラを落としてしまったそうだ…。 カメラを失くして落ち込んでいる$npc:11000471$のためにカメラを見つけてあげよう。
quest.manual: ロックフェラータワーの最上階で$item:30000249$を獲得する

quest.name: 철망 수리
quest.desc: $npc:29000025$ 따위는 전혀 무서워 하지 않는다는 $npc:11000472$. 빌딩 틈에 설치된 철망이 자꾸 흔들려 불안해 한 모양이다. 철망이 고정돼 있지 않은 상태에서 몸의 중심을 잃고 철망 쪽으로 쓰러지기라도 하면 자칫 철망과 함께 건물 아래로 떨어질 수 있다며 걱정하니 말이다. 언제까지 $npc:29000025$$pp:를,을$ 대신 잡아줄 순 없으니, $npc:11000472$$pp:를,을$ 위해 철망을 수리해 주자.
quest.manual: 록펠러 타워 건설 현장의 통크 주변 빌딩 틈에 있는 철망 수리하기

quest.name: 鉄網の修理
quest.desc: $npc:29000025$ごときはちっとも怖くないという$npc:11000472$。 しかし、ビルの隙間に設置された鉄網が揺れ続け、不安がっている。鉄網がしっかり固定されていないのに、バランスを崩して鉄網のほうに倒れてしまったら、鉄網とともに建物の下に落ちるかもしれないと心配しているのだ。 いつまでも$npc:29000025$を倒してあげるわけにはいかないから、$npc:11000472$のために鉄網を修理しよう。
quest.manual: ロックフェラータワー建設現場のトンク周辺にある鉄網の修理をする

quest.name: 설레는 마음
quest.desc: 반짝이는 것을 좋아하는 $map:02000023$의 요정들. 그런 요정들을 괴롭히기 위해 $map:02000006$의 몬스터들 역시 반짝이는 것들을 모은다고 한다. $npc:11000875$$pp:는,은$ 몬스터들이 갖고 있는 반짝이는 것들 중에 값 비싼 것들도 있을 거라며, 빼앗아 나눠 갖자고 제안한다. 속는 셈 치고 $npc:11000875$의 제안을 받아들여 보자.

quest.name: ときめく気持ち
quest.desc: 輝くものが大好きな$map:02000023$の妖精たち。そんな妖精たちをおびき寄せるために$map:02000006$のモンスターたちは輝くものを集めているという。$npc:11000875$は、モンスターが持っている輝くものの中に高価なものもあるはずだと言い、それを奪って山分けしようと提案してきた。騙されたと思って$npc:11000875$の言う通りにしてみよう。

quest.name: 실망은 아직 일러
quest.desc: $npc:11000875$$pp:는,은$ 몬스터들이 귀한 물건을 직접 가지고 있을 리가 없다며, 어딘가에 숨겨뒀을 거라고 말한다. 그리고는 $map:02000006$ 어디선가 본 흙더미가 수상하다며, 파헤쳐 볼 것을 요구한다. 과연 흙더미 안에는 무엇이 들어있을까?

quest.name: ガッカリするにはまだ早い
quest.desc: $npc:11000875$は、モンスターたちが貴重なアイテムをどこかに隠してあるはずだと主張した。$map:02000006$のどこかで見かけた土の山が怪しいと言い、掘ってみようと提案してきた。果たして、その中には何が隠されているのだろうか。
quest.manual: $map:02000006$にある土の山を掘る|$map:02000006$の$npc:21000264$を退治する

quest.name: 숲을 적시는 물
quest.desc: $map:02000024$ 나무 꼭대기의 물은 숲 전체로 흐르며 숲의 생명을 책임지고 있다고 한다. 그런데, 지진으로 물길이 끊기는 바람에 숲의 일부인 요정 숲이 말라가고 있다는데…… $npc:11000876$에게 빈 물병을 받아서 요정 숲을 살릴 수 있는 나무 꼭대기의 물을 담아서 가져다주자.

quest.name: 森を潤す水
quest.desc: $map:02000024$の木の頂上の水は、森全域を流れながら生き物たちを守っているという。ところで、地震によって水路が途絶えてしまい、森の一部である妖精の森が枯渇しているそうだ…。 $npc:11000876$から空き瓶をもらい、木の頂上から水を汲んで妖精の森を助けよう。
quest.manual: $map:02000024$の木の頂上にある水を$item:30000259$に汲む

quest.name: 훼방꾼 처치하기
quest.desc: 몬스터들을 피해 $item:30000260$$pp:를,을$ 무사히 운반할 자신이 없다는 $npc:11000876$. 자칫 물을 쏟기라도 할까 걱정하고 있는 $npc:11000876$$pp:를,을$ 위해 몬스터들을 처치하고 길을 터주자.

quest.name: 邪魔者を退治する
quest.desc: モンスターを回避して$item:30000260$を運ぶ自信がないという$npc:11000876$。水をこぼしてしまうのではないかと心配している$npc:11000876$のためにモンスターを退治し、道を開けよう。
quest.manual: $map:02000024$にいるモンスターを退治する

quest.name: 마녀의 놀이
quest.desc: 시종들과 함께 성 밖으로 산책을 나왔다가 $npc:11000745$와의 내기에 져 옷도 잃고 시종들도 잃은 $npc:11000857$. $npc:11000745$와의 가위바위보 승부에 이겨 $npc:11000857$의 옷을 되찾아주자.

quest.name: 魔女の遊び
quest.desc: 侍従たちと城の外に散歩に出かけたが、$npc:11000745$との賭けに負けて服も侍従も失ってしまった$npc:11000857$。 $npc:11000745$とのじゃんけんに勝ち、$npc:11000857$の服を取り返そう。

quest.name: 영혼 구출하기
quest.desc: $map:02000278$에 있는 이들과의 승부에 흥미를 잃은 $npc:11000745$. 모든 걸 원상태로 돌려놓고, 새로운 놀잇감을 찾아 이곳을 떠나겠다고 말한다. 그러기 위해 몬스터 안에 가둬둔 왕궁 사람들의 영혼을 가져다달라는 $npc:11000745$. 몬스터를 처치해 $item:30000324$$pp:를,을$ 구해내자.

quest.name: 魂を救出する
quest.desc: $map:02000278$にいる者たちとの勝負に興味を失った$npc:11000745$。 全てを元通りに戻し、新しい遊びを探しにいくと言った。 そのために、モンスターの中に閉じ込めておいた王宮の人々の魂を持ってきてほしいと言う$npc:11000745$。 モンスターを退治し、$item:30000324$を手に入れよう。
quest.manual: $map:02000278$にいるモンスターを退治し、$item:30000324$を助ける

quest.name: (Dungeon) A Reason to Train
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:20015001$ Entrance: $map:02000175$ Party Size: 4 This quest is only available on normal difficulty.
$npcName:11001073$ is determined to become skilled enough to win an 18-on-1 battle. If you want to follow in his footsteps, then you need to start by facing two worthy opponents at once. He demands that you defeat $npcName:23100033$.

quest.name: ダンジョン：修練を積む理由
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:20015001$ (入口マップ：$map:02000175$) パーティ推奨(4人) ノーマルモードでのみクエストを遂行できます。
$npc:11001073$は、自分が修練する理由は、18対1で戦うためだと言う。世界の悪の群れは、全て18人で構成されていて、自分はその人数を相手にできるように修練を積まねばならないそうだ。 すでに2対1の戦いは数多く経験したので、自分と会話するには、それぐらいの実力を備える必要があるという言葉も付け加えた$npc:11001073$。$npc:23100033$を叩きのめしてくることを要求した。

quest.name: (Dungeon) Upping the Ante
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:20015001$ Entrance: $map:02000175$ Party Size: 4 This quest is only available on normal difficulty.
$npcName:11001073$ is stunned that you not only defeated $npcName:23100033$, but that you did it dozens of times. Now he's bragging that he regularly wins 4-on-1 fights, and that you'll have to do better to reach his level.

quest.name: ダンジョン：戸惑う武道家
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:20015001$ (入口マップ：$map:02000175$) パーティ推奨(4人) ノーマルモードでのみクエストを遂行できます。
要求どおり、$npc:23100033$を数十回叩きのめしてきたと話すと、身震いする$npc:11001073$。 自分は4対1で戦った経験も数多くあるので、自分と対等な立場になりたければ、$npc:23100033$をもう数十回叩きのめさなければならないと言った。

quest.name: 작별 인사
quest.desc: $npc:11000293$$pp:는,은$ $map:02000024$$pp:를,을$ 떠나기에 앞서, 평소 친구라 여기던 $npc:11001142$에게 작별 인사를 하고 싶어한다. 하지만, 직접 얼굴을 보고 얘기하면 눈물이 날 것 같다며 대신 인사를 부탁한다.

quest.name: お別れの挨拶
quest.desc: $npc:11000293$は$map:02000024$を発つ前に、普段仲良くしていた$npc:11001142$にお別れの挨拶をしたいと言う。 しかし、顔を見て話したら涙がこぼれそうだと言い、代わりに挨拶してほしいと頼んできた。

quest.name: 작별 선물
quest.desc: 겉으로는 퉁명스럽기만 한 $npc:11001142$. $npc:11000293$$pp:가,이$ $map:02000024$$pp:를,을$ 떠나기로 했다는 말에 내심 충격을 받은 것 같다. 어쩔 줄 몰라하던 $npc:11001142$$pp:는,은$ 조심스럽게 $item:30000389$$pp:를,을$ 건넨다. $npc:11000293$에게 작별 선물로 전해 달라는 말과 함께…

quest.name: お餞別
quest.desc: ツンデレな$npc:11001142$。 $npc:11000293$が$map:02000024$を離れるという話を聞き、ショックを受けたようだ。 $npc:11001142$はそっと$item:30000389$を差し出した。 $npc:11000293$に届けてほしいという言葉とともに…。

quest.name: 변해가는 친구들
quest.desc: 한때 친하게 지냈던 $npc:21091166$의 변한 모습이 안타깝기만 한 $npc:11000298$. 사악한 영혼의 지배를 받게 되자, 몸 색깔이 짙고 어둡게 변했다고 한다. 몸 색깔이 변하자, 성격 또한 포악해졌다는데…… 친구였던 $npc:21091166$$pp:가,이$ 사악한 영혼으로부터 해방되길 바라는 $npc:11000298$. 그의 소원을 들어주자.

quest.name: 変わっていく仲間たち
quest.desc: 一時は仲良しだった$npc:21091166$の変わり果てた姿に悲しむ$npc:11000298$。 邪悪な魂の支配を受けてから体の色が暗く変わってしまったという。 体の色が変わってから性格も暴悪になったんだとか…。 友達だった$npc:21091166$が邪悪な魂から解放されるのを願う$npc:11000298$。 彼の願いを叶えてあげよう。

quest.name: 굳어가는 숲
quest.desc: 숲의 모든 것들이 딱딱하게 굳어가기 시작한 건 장난감들이 숲에 들어오고 나서부터라고 한다. 숲의 생명체들 모두 처음 보는 장난감들을 마냥 신기해하고 가까이 두고 싶어 했지만, 금세 전염병 퍼지듯 장난감과 같이 딱딱해지고 감정을 잃어가게 됐다고 한다. 숲을 되살리기 위해 장난감들을 없애달라고 부탁하는 $npc:11000298$. 그의 부탁을 들어주자.

quest.name: 固まっていく森
quest.desc: おもちゃたちが森に入ってきた日以来、森の全てが固まりはじめたという。 森の生き物たちは初めて見るおもちゃたちを見て面白がって近寄ったが、 まるで伝染病のようにみんな固まり始めて、感情も失ってしまったという。 森を守るためにおもちゃたちを退治してほしいと頼む$npc:11000298$。 彼の頼みを聞いてあげよう。

quest.name: 오늘의 운세
quest.desc: 바닥에 주저 앉아 손 내밀고 있는 폼이 영낙없는 거렁뱅이인 $npc:11001144$. 지나가는 사람을 볼 때마다 점을 봐주겠다며 능청스레 말을 건넨다. 복채도 안 받고, 재미삼아 봐 준다는데 한번 점이나 봐 볼까?

quest.name: 今日の運勢
quest.desc: みすぼらしい服を身にまとった$npc:11001144$。 通行人たちに運勢を占ってあげると話しかけている。 無料だし、一度占ってもらおうかな？

quest.name: Strong Grip
quest.desc: Traveling with the Allicari, $npcName:11001181$ has experienced and seen a lot of crazy stuff for his young age. One time, he visited an island full of people who climbed everywhere to get around. Maybe you should give it a try.
quest.manual: Use the $skill:20000011$ skill to move 100 m

quest.name: Abyssal Courage
quest.desc: Traveling with the Allicari, $npcName:11001181$ has experienced and seen a lot of crazy stuff for his young age. One time, he visited a village where the warriors entered tiger dens to test their courage. You know of a place scarier than a tiger den...

quest.name: A Soaring Conversation
quest.desc: Traveling with the Allicari, $npcName:11001181$ has experienced and seen a lot of crazy stuff for his young age. One time, he had a chat with a bird while it flew him across a valley. What kind of conversation did he have, anyway...?

quest.name: Greater Heights
quest.desc: Traveling with the Allicari, $npcName:11001181$ has experienced and seen a lot of crazy stuff for his young age. One time, he visited an island where people jumped everywhere to get taller. Would that even work?

quest.name: Hanging Around
quest.desc: Traveling with the Allicari, $npcName:11001181$ has experienced and seen a lot of crazy stuff for his young age. According to him, the strongest man he ever met got that way simply by hanging off a ladder for hours. This could be an easy way to work on your beach bod...
quest.manual: Hang on a ladder for 300 seconds

quest.name: To Catch a Mate
quest.desc: Traveling with the Allicari, $npcName:11001181$ has experienced and seen a lot of crazy stuff for his young age. One time, he visited an island where all the $male:men,female:women$ hung from ropes to attract a mate. Could such an intriguing ritual work in modern society...?
quest.manual: Hang from a rope for 120 seconds

quest.name: Take a Dip
quest.desc: Traveling with the Allicari, $npcName:11001181$ has experienced and seen a lot of crazy stuff for his young age. One time, he visited an island full of people who practically lived in the water. You could probably use a quick bath, yourself.

quest.name: Growth through Adversity
quest.desc: Traveling with the Allicari, $npcName:11001181$ has experienced and seen a lot of crazy stuff for his young age. One time, he learned a secret technique for helping grass grow: stomping the heck out of it. This sounds legit.

quest.name: To Survive a Shipwreck
quest.desc: Traveling with the Allicari, $npcName:11001181$ has experienced and seen a lot of crazy stuff for his young age. According to him, all Allicari are strong swimmers so that they're ready if they ever shipwreck. That's not a bad idea...

quest.name: Keep Low
quest.desc: Traveling with the Allicari, $npcName:11001181$ has experienced and seen a lot of crazy stuff for his young age. One time, he visited an island where the hunters all crawled when they were hunting their prey. Sounds stealthy.

quest.name: Wayfarer's Blues
quest.desc: Traveling with the Allicari, $npcName:11001181$ has experienced and seen a lot of crazy stuff for his young age. He loves to travel, but he feels bad leaving all of his old friends behind. If only there was another way to see far-off places...

quest.name: Finders Keepers
quest.desc: Traveling with the Allicari, $npcName:11001181$ has experienced and seen a lot of crazy stuff for his young age. He's heard there are golden treasure chests hidden all over the place. It won't do for these precious treasures to distract future customers from precious Allicari merchandise! You should help round these treasures up.

quest.name: World in a Hat
quest.desc: Traveling with the Allicari, $npcName:11001181$ has experienced and seen a lot of crazy stuff for his young age. He's heard there are magical hats that will take you to pocket realms, where you can find many fantastical things. You like fantastical things, don't you?

quest.name: $npcName:11000273$
quest.desc: Traveling with the Allicari, $npcName:11001181$ has experienced and seen a lot of crazy stuff for his young age. One time, he lost a fight against a monster and needed to see a doctor to get fixed up. You should get to know $npcName:11000273$ in case you ever need treatment after a bad fight.

quest.name: $npcName:11000274$
quest.desc: Traveling with the Allicari, $npcName:11001181$ has experienced and seen a lot of crazy stuff for his young age. One time, he lost a fight against a monster and needed to see a doctor to get fixed up. You should get to know $npcName:11000274$ in case you ever need treatment after a bad fight.

quest.name: The Safest Bank
quest.desc: Traveling with the Allicari, $npcName:11001181$ has experienced and seen a lot of crazy stuff for his young age. He often has to run errands at the bank, and has been using $map:02000034$ since coming to Tria. It seems he's interested in $map:02000155$...

quest.name: A Blessed Day
quest.desc: Traveling with the Allicari, $npcName:11001181$ has experienced and seen a lot of crazy stuff for his young age. One of his favorite hobbies is clapping, and he hears there's a place nearby that's just great for it. You might as well indulge in his weird hobby and check it out.

quest.name: These City Streets
quest.desc: Traveling with the Allicari, $npcName:11001181$ has experienced and seen a lot of crazy stuff for his young age. He says that losing yourself in a city can wipe away your frustration and sadness. Imagine how effective it would be to lose yourself in <i>six</font> cities!

quest.name: The Best Policy
quest.desc: Traveling with the Allicari, $npcName:11001181$ has experienced and seen a lot of crazy stuff for his young age. One time, he made a stop at a prison colony and it made him devoted to a life of honesty. Maybe you need a reminder of the high price of crime.

quest.name: Fashion in Chains
quest.desc: Traveling with the Allicari, $npcName:11001181$ has experienced and seen a lot of crazy stuff for his young age. According to him, you can probably find a prison jumpsuit if you dig through the trash cans in jail. This strikes you as a sensible course of action.

quest.name: Nothing Is Useless
quest.desc: Traveling with the Allicari, $npcName:11001181$ has experienced and seen a lot of crazy stuff for his young age. According to him, sometimes you'll find something of value in plain wooden chests. You have been known to covet things of value...

quest.name: The Secret to Health
quest.desc: Traveling with the Allicari, $npcName:11001181$ has experienced and seen a lot of crazy stuff for his young age. One time, he visited an island where everybody runs all day. He doesn't know why they did it, but they were probably in great shape.

quest.name: Quick and Convenient
quest.desc: Traveling with the Allicari, $npcName:11001181$ has experienced and seen a lot of crazy stuff for his young age. One time, he visited an island where everybody used taxis to get around. Wait a second! Doesn't this island have taxis?

quest.name: Rest Your Feet
quest.desc: Traveling with the Allicari, $npcName:11001181$ has experienced and seen a lot of crazy stuff for his young age. One time, he visited an island where everybody rode mounts instead of walking. When you really think about it, mounts rule and walking drools.

quest.name: Nature's View
quest.desc: Traveling with the Allicari, $npcName:11001181$ has experienced and seen a lot of crazy stuff for his young age. According to him, the best way to see nature is with your naked eye looking through the lens of a telescope.
quest.manual: Use the binoculars at $map:02000090$ |Use the binoculars at $map:02000172$ |Use the binoculars at $map:02000103$ |Use the binoculars at $map:02000024$

quest.name: See the Sea
quest.desc: Traveling with the Allicari, $npcName:11001181$ has experienced and seen a lot of crazy stuff for his young age. According to him, nothing soothes the furious heart like a nice, long glare at the sea.
quest.manual: Use the binoculars at $map:02000062$ |Use the binoculars at $map:02000067$

quest.name: Cityscapes
quest.desc: Traveling with the Allicari, $npcName:11001181$ has experienced and seen a lot of crazy stuff for his young age. He says that every city has a dark side. Like most things, the best way to see it is with a telescope.
quest.manual: Use the binoculars at $map:02000100$ |Use the binoculars at $map:02000164$ |Use the binoculars at $map:02000273$

quest.name: $item:20000102$ for Your Wounds
quest.desc: Traveling with the Allicari, $npcName:11001181$ has experienced and seen a lot of crazy stuff for his young age. One time, he visited an island that used $item:20000102$ to cure itchy bug bites. You can probably find some in the Land of Darkness.

quest.name: Going for the Gold
quest.desc: Traveling with the Allicari, $npcName:11001181$ has experienced and seen a lot of crazy stuff for his young age. He says that finding a golden treasure chest is no big deal, and that he can do it in his sleep. You've resolved to find one, too—and you'll do it without even being half asleep!

quest.name: The Worst
quest.desc: Traveling with the Allicari, $npcName:11001181$ has experienced and seen a lot of crazy stuff for his young age. According to him, Victoria Island is probably the worst place he's ever been thanks to all the monster. Vanquish monsters and save the local tourism industry!

quest.name: Scary Cute
quest.desc: Most adults know to avoid the snakes in $map:02010022$, but it usually takes a snakebite or two for the local children to learn their lesson. If only the $npcNamePlural:21000392$ and $npcNamePlural:21000400$ weren't so dang cute!

quest.name: $npcName:11001456$'s Message
quest.desc: $npcName:11001456$ asked me to find her husband, who's looking for $itemPlural:30000505$ in $map:02010022$. Since you already gathered the petals, there's no need for him to wrestle with any more snakes.

quest.name: Rock Formations of $map:02010022$
quest.desc: $npcName:11001457$ spotted a telescope in $map:02010022$, but he can't reach it. With your $skill:20000021$, you should be able to get to it and take a look at the island's landscape.

quest.name: A Big Name in Begging
quest.desc: $map:02010012$ may still be under construction, but $npcName:11001466$ has already claimed his begging spot. Unfortunately, the robots keep giving him a hard time. Punish them for hurting $npcName:11001466$.

quest.name: Construction Unending
quest.desc: $npcName:11001466$ says that the work around $map:02010012$ is going too slowly. The sooner construction finishes, the sooner he can get to the good begging!

quest.name: Construction Check-up
quest.desc: If you really want to know how the construction is going, you need to talk to $npcName:11001468$. Apparently he's late sending his status report to $npcName:11001467$.

quest.name: Scattered Plan
quest.desc: $npcName:11001468$ would just love to give you a report on the construction status, but he misplaced his $item:30000506$. Get his copy back from one of the robot workers. You may need to use force...

quest.name: Get Rich Quick
quest.desc: $npcName:11001470$ was kicked out of his family home for trying to cheat his own brother. While he's just barely getting by, it seems he has big plans—and he wants you to be part of them.
quest.manual: Jump from $map:02010039$ |Defeat the robot workers in $map:02010039$

quest.name: Perpetual Repairs
quest.desc: The bridge is new, but it's already in need of constant repair. One of the bridge supports is even leaning to the side. Maybe $npcName:11001470$ knows why.

quest.name: Mile-high Fog
quest.desc:
You can clearly from one end of the bridge in $map:02010039$ to the other, but the middle is hidden in thick fog. There's a local rumor that an evil dragon lives in the fog, damaging the bridge and scaring the local children. Others say that the bridge is haunted by the ghosts of workers who died.
$npcName:11001469$ came out here to check it out. Maybe he knows the true story.
quest.manual: Climb the arch above $map:02010039$ and look around

quest.name: The Brave Friend
quest.desc:
There's a lot of money pouring in from $map:02010002$ to develop $map:02010063$. Many locals of the surrounding areas have come to work high-paying construction jobs, but since the robots all went insane, most of the workers are now trying to escape with their lives.
$npcName:11001401$ climbed up the bridge in a desperate attempt to evade the bots, but got stuck halfway. His friend $npcName:11001400$ is trying to get him some food to calm his nerves.
quest.manual: Get $itemPlural:30000507$ from the supply packages in $map:02010038$

quest.name: Part-time Trap
quest.desc: $npcName:11001401$ seems to have calmed down a bit. He wants you to clear a path through the crazed robots so he can escape. When you're done, ask $npcName:11001400$ if he's given any thought to $npcName:11001401$'s idea.

quest.name: The Best Business Plan
quest.desc: $npcName:11001381$ has great plans for the future of $map:02010063$, but first he needs to win over the locals. A picture of the desolate, unexploited mountain peaks would be just the thing—but the rampaging robots make taking pictures a bit challenging. This job is right up your alley.

quest.name: It's Just Business
quest.desc: $npcName:11001381$ has finished his $item:30000509$, and it's time to share it with to $npcName:11001386$ of $map:02010063$. The villagers may not respond well to being asked to relocate while the development is going on...

quest.name: The Elder Approves
quest.desc: $npcName:11001386$ is satisfied with the $item:30000509$. He believes that this development can bring the region into the modern world. Take his $item:30000510$ to $npcName:11001382$.

quest.name: Feet on the Wall
quest.desc: $npcName:11001369$ feels bad for the city folk, who live hurried and serious lives. He suggests you do something extraordinary so you don't get too serious, yourself. You can start by climbing a wall with the $skill:20000011$ skill.
quest.manual: Use the $skill:20000011$ skill to move 100 m

quest.name: Flight of Fancy
quest.desc: $npcName:11001369$ feels bad for the city folk, who live hurried and serious lives. He suggests you do something extraordinary so you don't get too serious, yourself. You can start by flying the friendly skies.

quest.name: On All Fours
quest.desc: $npcName:11001369$ feels bad for the city folk, who live hurried and serious lives. He suggests you do something extraordinary so you don't get too serious, yourself. You can start by crawling around.

quest.name: Swimming the Day Away
quest.desc: $npcName:11001369$ feels bad for the city folk, who live hurried and serious lives. He suggests you do something extraordinary so you don't get too serious, yourself. You can start by going for a swim.

quest.name: Mount Up
quest.desc: $npcName:11001369$ feels bad for the city folk, who live hurried and serious lives. He suggests you do something extraordinary so you don't get too serious, yourself. You can start by riding around on your mount.

quest.name: Desert Scenery
quest.desc: $npcName:11001369$ feels bad for the city folk, who live hurried and serious lives. He suggests you do something extraordinary so you don't get too serious, yourself. You can start by taking in the desert scenery with a telescope.
quest.manual: Use the binoculars at $map:02010084$ |Use the binoculars at $map:02010033$

quest.name: Full Tilt
quest.desc: $npcName:11001369$ feels bad for the city folk, who live hurried and serious lives. He suggests you do something extraordinary so you don't get too serious, yourself. You can start by going for a run.

quest.name: Beneath the Bridge
quest.desc: $npcName:11001369$ feels bad for the city folk, who live hurried and serious lives. He suggests you do something extraordinary so you don't get too serious, yourself. You can start by checking out the view under the bridge with a telescope.
quest.manual: Use the binoculars at $map:02010039$ |Use the binoculars at $map:02010038$

quest.name: With Outstretched Arms
quest.desc: $npcName:11001369$ feels bad for the city folk, who live hurried and serious lives. He suggests you do something extraordinary so you don't get too serious, yourself. You can start by jumping from a high place.

quest.name: The Human Pogo
quest.desc: $npcName:11001369$ feels bad for the city folk, who live hurried and serious lives. He suggests you do something extraordinary so you don't get too serious, yourself. You can start by jumping around.

quest.name: Hello, Ludari City!
quest.desc: $npcName:11001369$ feels bad for the city folk, who live hurried and serious lives. He suggests you do something extraordinary so you don't get too serious, yourself. You can start by greeting passersby in $map:02010002$.

quest.name: Hello, Minar!
quest.desc: $npcName:11001369$ feels bad for the city folk, who live hurried and serious lives. He suggests you do something extraordinary so you don't get too serious, yourself. You can start by greeting passersby in $map:02010063$.

quest.name: On the Line
quest.desc: $npcName:11001369$ feels bad for the city folk, who live hurried and serious lives. He suggests you do something extraordinary so you don't get too serious, yourself. You can start by enjoying some nice, relaxing fishing.

quest.name: The Joys of Freshwater Fishing
quest.desc: $npcName:11001369$ feels bad for the city folk, who live hurried and serious lives. He suggests you do something extraordinary so you don't get too serious, yourself. You can start by enjoying some freshwater fishing.

quest.name: The Joys of Ocean Fishing
quest.desc: $npcName:11001369$ feels bad for the city folk, who live hurried and serious lives. He suggests you do something extraordinary so you don't get too serious, yourself. You can start by enjoying some ocean fishing.

quest.name: The Thrill of Lava Fishing
quest.desc: $npcName:11001369$ feels bad for the city folk, who live hurried and serious lives. He suggests you do something extraordinary so you don't get too serious, yourself. You can start by lava fishing.

quest.name: The Thrill of Foulwater Fishing
quest.desc: $npcName:11001369$ feels bad for the city folk, who live hurried and serious lives. He suggests you do something extraordinary so you don't get too serious, yourself. You can start by enjoying some foulwater fishing.

quest.name: No More Worries
quest.desc: $npcName:11001369$ feels bad for the city folk, who live hurried and serious lives. He suggests you do something extraordinary so you don't get too serious, yourself. You can start by experiencing the freedom of the $item:50400107$.

quest.name: Rockabye
quest.desc: $npcName:11001369$ feels bad for the city folk, who live hurried and serious lives. He suggests you do something extraordinary so you don't get too serious, yourself. You can start by taking a rest on a comfortable $item:50400109$.

quest.name: Lost in the Music
quest.desc: $npcName:11001369$ feels bad for the city folk, who live hurried and serious lives. He suggests you do something extraordinary so you don't get too serious, yourself. You can start by getting lost in the rhythm with a solo performance.

quest.name: Hammer Pig Mayhem
quest.desc: $npcName:11001179$ feels bad for the city folk, who live hurried and serious lives. He suggests you do something extraordinary to spice things up. Start by challenging $npcName:23000057$ in $map:02010020$.

quest.name: Shady Shaman
quest.desc: $npcName:11001179$ feels bad for the city folk, who live hurried and serious lives. He suggests you do something extraordinary to spice things up. Start by challenging $npcName:23000009$ in $map:02010027$.

quest.name: Face the Legend
quest.desc: $npcName:11001179$ feels bad for the city folk, who live hurried and serious lives. He suggests you do something extraordinary to spice things up. Start by challenging $npcName:23000029$ in $map:02010022$.

quest.name: (Dungeon) One Last Card
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:21015001$ Entrance: $map:02010009$ Party Size: 4 This quest is only available on normal difficulty.
$npcName:11001369$ feels bad for the city folk, who live hurried and serious lives. He suggests you do something extraordinary to spice things up. Start by challenging $npcName:24001507$ in $map:02000337$.

quest.name: (Dungeon) Obfuscating Stupidity
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:21010001$ Entrance: $map:02010084$ Party Size: 4 This quest is only available on normal difficulty.
$npcName:11001369$ feels bad for the city folk, who live hurried and serious lives. He suggests you do something extraordinary to spice things up. Start by challenging $npcName:24001309$ in $map:02000338$.

quest.name: (Dungeon) Stinky Neighbors
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:20017001$ Entrance: $map:02010019$ Party Size: 4 This quest is only available on normal difficulty.
$npcName:11001369$ feels bad for the city folk, who live hurried and serious lives. He suggests you do something extraordinary to spice things up. Start by challenging $npcName:23090066$ in $map:02010050$.

quest.name: (Dungeon) Giving Chase
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:25010001$ Entrance: $map:02010026$ This quest is only available on normal difficulty.
$npcName:11001369$ feels bad for the city folk, who live hurried and serious lives. He suggests you do something extraordinary to spice things up. Start by challenging $npcName:24001807$ in $map:02010052$.

quest.name: (Dungeon) Shaman behind the Moon
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:21014001$ Entrance: $map:02010047$ Party Size: 4 This quest is only available on normal difficulty.
$npcName:11001369$ feels bad for the city folk, who live hurried and serious lives. He suggests you do something extraordinary to spice things up. Start by challenging $npcName:24002005$ in $map:02010054$.

quest.name: (Dungeon) The End of Desire
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:25009001$ Entrance: $map:02010023$ This quest is only available on normal difficulty.
$npcName:11001369$ feels bad for the city folk, who live hurried and serious lives. He suggests you do something extraordinary to spice things up. Start by challenging $npcName:24001904$ in $map:02010070$.

quest.name: Desert Outlaws
quest.desc: $npcName:11001369$ feels bad for the city folk, who live hurried and serious lives. He suggests you do something extraordinary to spice things up. Start by teaching the monsters of Karkar Island a lesson in manners.
quest.manual: Defeat the monsters of Karkar Island

quest.name: 몸을 숨긴 이유
quest.desc: 무심결에 $npc:21000262$$pp:와,과$ $npc:21000264$ 앞에서 내뱉은 한마디 때문에 위험에 처한 $npcName:11001537$. 양파를 튀겨 먹으면 맛있다고 말했다는데… 숨어있는 $npcName:11001537$$pp:가,이$ 밖으로 나올 수 있게 $npc:21000262$$pp:와,과$ $npc:21000264$$pp:를,을$ 쫓아내자.

quest.name: 身を隠した理由
quest.desc: $npc:21000262$と$npc:21000264$の前でデリカシーのない発言をして困っている$npcName:11001537$。玉ねぎを揚げて食べると美味しいと言ってしまったそうだが…。 隠れている$npcName:11001537$が外に出られるように$npc:21000262$と$npc:21000264$を追い出そう。

quest.name: 토르하라의 눈물
quest.desc: 요리대회 출전을 눈앞에 둔 상태에서 요리 재료를 구하기 위해 이곳에 왔다는 $npcName:11001537$. $npcName:11000285$의 눈물이 모여 고인 샘물에서 물을 길어다 음식을 만들면, 먹은 사람 모두 음식에 반하게 된다고 한다. $npcName:11001537$$pp:를,을$ 위해 샘물을 길어다 주자.
quest.manual: $npcName:11000285$$pp:가,이$ 몸 담그고 있는 샘물을 물병에 담은 후 물병 챙기기

quest.name: トルハラの涙
quest.desc: 料理大会の出場を控え、食材を手に入れるためにここにやってきたという$npcName:11001537$。$npcName:11000285$の涙が溜まってできた泉の水で料理を作れば、食べた人みんなを虜にすることができるらしい。 $npcName:11001537$のために泉の水を汲んであげよう。
quest.manual: $npcName:11000285$がいる泉の水を瓶に入れる

quest.name: 토르하라여, 사랑을 이뤄주오
quest.desc: 이룰 수 없는 사랑도 $npcName:11000285$에게 말하면 모두 이루어진다는 소문을 듣고 이곳을 찾았다는 $npcName:11001538$. 하지만 $npcName:11000285$$pp:는,은$ 소원을 이뤄줄 능력이 없다며 $npcName:11001538$$pp:를,을$ 돌려보냈다고 한다. 힘들게 이곳까지 온 만큼 얻는 것 없이 돌아가기가 아쉬운 $npcName:11001538$. 그녀를 위해 $npcName:11000285$$pp:를,을$ 만나보자.

quest.name: トルハラよ、愛を叶えてくれ
quest.desc: 叶わぬ恋も$npcName:11000285$に言えば、全て叶うという噂を聞きつけてここにやってきたという$npcName:11001538$。しかし、$npcName:11000285$は願いを叶える能力などないと言い、$npcName:11001538$を帰したという。 せっかくここまで来たのに、収穫なしで帰りたくないという$npcName:11001538$。彼女のために$npcName:11000285$に会ってみよう。

quest.name: 마음 속 응원만
quest.desc: 자신의 사랑도 지키지 못했는데 다른 이의 사랑에 무슨 힘이 돼 줄 수 있겠느냐며, 자신을 둘러싼 소문은 헛소문이라고 말하는 $npcName:11000285$. 이제 더는 소문에 휘둘려 자신을 귀찮게 하는 이가 없길 바라는 듯하다.

quest.name: 心の中で応援するだけ
quest.desc: 自分の恋も叶わなかったのに、他人の願いを叶えられるわけがないと言い、自分を巡る噂は根拠のない話だと言う$npcName:11000285$。その噂は真実でないと拡散してほしいようだ。

quest.name: 闇は闇で
quest.desc: $item:30000428$に興味を示す$npcName:11001242$。ちょうど自分が研究中の力の波長理論によれば、不吉な魔力の封印を解く方法がありそうだと言い、強い闇の力が凝縮された結晶体を持ってくることを頼んだ。 $map:2000350$で手に入る$item:30000437$を集めて$npcName:11001242$に届けよう。

quest.name: 歪んだ力
quest.desc: $npcName:23090005$の武器に宿る不吉な魔力の封印を解くことに成功した$npcName:11001242$。渋い顔で$map:02000203$で武器を精錬したほうがいいと言う。 $item:15000041$を持って$map:02000203$の$npcName:11001211$を訪ねてみよう。

quest.desc: $npcName:23090005$の武器に宿る不吉な魔力の封印を解くことに成功した$npcName:11001242$。渋い顔で$map:02000203$で武器を精錬したほうがいいと言う。 $item:15200142$を持って$map:02000203$の$npcName:11001211$を訪ねてみよう。

quest.name: It's a Secret
quest.desc: $npc:11001406$ is looking for $npcName:11001412$ who went missing in $map:02010033$. Look for clues that could lead you to $npcName:11001412$ in $map:02010026$.

quest.name: Meerkat Matters
quest.desc: $npc:11001406$ is certain that $npcName:11001412$ made it back to $map:02010006$ safe and sound. He made a big deal about it... but maybe you should check to be sure. Go to $map:02010006$ and ask $npc:11001408$ about $npcName:11001412$.

quest.name: Meerkats Care
quest.desc: The Meerkat Patrol is not just a gaggle of small, weak critters. $npcName:11001408$ said they were able to build an organization that keeps tabs on all of Karkar Island through bonds of trust. Their tireless vigilance is what helped them save $npcName:11001412$, in fact. Go have a word with $npcName:11001412$.

quest.name: Walk with Light
quest.desc: $npcName:11001430$ is a mysterious boy in $map:02010047$. He's from another dimension and is looking for a way to return home. Meet with $npcName:11001431$ who was there when the boy arrived. He might have some clues to share.

quest.name: A Light in the Night
quest.desc: $npcName:11001431$ said that on that fateful day, there was a shooting star and a small earthquake but that was it. Still, you're pretty sure he knows more about $npcName:11001430$ than he's letting on. Tell $npcName:11001430$ what you've learned.

quest.name: The Smallest Clue
quest.desc: $npcName:11001430$ said you might turn something up if you examine the monsters in the area. Battle $npcName:21000645$ and $npcName:21000424$ and search their bodies for clues.

quest.name: Studies in Light
quest.desc: $npcName:11001430$ has been studying the history of the ruins intently, searching for a way to return to his home. He finally came across something of note, and asks you to review the research journal he hid. Look for $item:30000497$ in $map:02010007$, $npcName:11001430$'s hideout.
quest.manual: Find the research journal that $npcName:11001430$ hid in $map:02010007$

quest.name: A Friend's Request
quest.desc: $item:30000497$ was filled with information about a relic of light that can pierce the barriers between dimensions. $npcName:11001430$ wants to find $npcName:11000735$ because he thinks she knows more about the relic. Since you decided to be friends with $npcName:11001430$, listen to $npcName:11001431$'s request in his place.

quest.name: Raising Starlight
quest.desc: $npcName:11001431$ said you'll need materials first before watering the starflower. He said to get $item:30000498$ and $item:30000499$. Find what you need in $map:02010047$.

quest.name: Blooming Starflowers
quest.desc: $npcName:11001431$ produced $item:30000500$ from the materials you gathered. He said the lonely starflowers will love the water from this tool. Find the starflowers all over $map:02010047$ and water them.

quest.name: Patience Training
quest.desc: $npcName:11001409$ is in charge of training the top meerkat patrols. He suggests that you take part in the Meerkat Patrol's patience training to shape up as their members have. Try the Meerkat Patrol's beginner course.
quest.manual: Climb 200m |Hang on the ladder for 180 sec |Hang on the rope for 180 sec

quest.name: Combat Training
quest.desc: $npcName:11001409$ is in charge of training the top meerkat patrols. He explains that although the meerkats mostly patrol from high places, in critical situations they have to fight. Try the Meerkat Patrol's combat training.

quest.name: Conversation Training
quest.desc: $npcName:11001409$ is in charge of training the top meerkat patrols. He said one of their key talents is getting information through conversation. He tells you to find $npcName:11001407$ somewhere in $map:02010033$ and have a full conversation.

quest.name: 予想外の手がかり
quest.desc: $npc:11001211$は、$map:02000203$を訪れたある呪術師から、強力な悪魔の呪いを解ける方法は、悪魔の意識の中に入ることだと教えられたそうだ。$npc:23090005$を見つけて$map:02000200$へ向かったという$npc:11001485$に会ってみよう。

quest.name: 不滅の炎
quest.desc: 悪魔の研究を行う$npc:11001485$は$npc:23090005$のような強力な悪魔の呪いを解くためには、弱っている隙を狙い悪魔の意識の中に入り、彼の本質を確認するべきだと教えてくれた。$map:02000200$のどこかに装置を仕掛けてあるので、$npc:23090005$を倒した後、辺りを見渡せば$npc:23090005$の意識の中に入れる通路が開くはずだというが…。$npc:23090005$を倒して$map:52000014$の中に入り、武器に宿る呪いを解く方法を見つけよう。

quest.name: 不滅の炎
quest.desc: 悪魔の研究を行う$npc:11001485$は$npc:23090005$のような強力な悪魔の呪いを解くためには、弱っている隙を狙い悪魔の意識の中に入り、彼の本質を確認するべきだと教えてくれた。$map:02000200$のどこかに装置を仕掛けてあるので、$npc:23090005$を倒した後、辺りを見渡せば$npc:23090005$の意識の中に入れる通路が開くはずだというが…。$npc:23090005$を倒して$map:52000014$の中に入り、武器に宿る呪いを解く方法を見つけよう。
quest.manual: $npc:23090005$を退治した後、$map:52000014$に入り、$item:15400064$にかけられた呪いを解く

quest.name: Darkness Within Darkness
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001242$ is very interested in the $item:30000560$. He has a hypothesis on how to remove the weapon's curse, and asks you to obtain a crystal formed from condensed darkness to test it.
Find the $item:30000437$ in $map:2000350$ and bring it to $npcName:11001242$.

quest.name: Darkness Within Darkness
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001242$ is very interested in the $item:30000561$. He has a hypothesis on how to remove the weapon's curse, and asks you to obtain a crystal formed from condensed darkness to test it.
Find the $item:30000437$ in $map:2000350$ and bring it to $npcName:11001242$.

quest.name: Power Struggle
quest.desc: $npcName:11001242$ succeeded in breaking the ominous curse on $npcName:23090005$'s weapon. But he also said that wasn't enough, and you need to head to $map:02000203$ and reforge the weapon. Take $item:15500064$ to $npcName:11001211$ in $map:02000203$.

quest.name: Power Struggle
quest.desc: $npcName:11001242$ succeeded in breaking the ominous curse on $npcName:23090005$'s weapon. But he also said that wasn't enough, and you need to head to $map:02000203$ and reforge the weapon. Take $item:15600064$ to $npcName:11001211$ in $map:02000203$.

quest.name: An Unexpected Clue
quest.desc: A shaman from $map:02000203$ told $npcName:11001211$ that the way to remove the powerful curse of a demon is to enter the demon's consciousness. Find $npcName:23090005$ and meet $npcName:11001485$ who left for $map:02000200$.

quest.name: An Unexpected Clue
quest.desc: A shaman from $map:02000203$ told $npcName:11001211$ that the way to remove the powerful curse of a demon is to enter the demon's consciousness. Find $npcName:23090005$ and meet $npcName:11001485$ who left for $map:02000200$.

quest.name: Eternal Flame
quest.desc: $npcName:11001485$ tells you that if you want to break the curse of a powerful demon like $npcName:23090005$, you must enter their consciousness while they are weakened. There's a device in $map:02000200$ which can allow you to do just that, so once you defeat $npcName:23090005$ you need only find the path which opens nearby. Defeat $npcName:23090005$ and enter $map:52000014$ to find a way to break the curse.
quest.manual: After defeating $npcName:23090005$, enter $map:52000014$ and break the curse on $item:15500064$

quest.name: Eternal Flame
quest.desc: $npcName:11001485$ tells you that if you want to break the curse of a powerful demon like $npcName:23090005$, you must enter their consciousness while they are weakened. There's a device in $map:02000200$ which can allow you to do just that, so once you defeat $npcName:23090005$ you need only find the path which opens nearby. Defeat $npcName:23090005$ and enter $map:52000014$ to find a way to break the curse.
quest.manual: After defeating $npcName:23090005$, enter $map:52000014$ and break the curse on $item:15600064$

quest.name: Balrog's Blood
quest.desc: You defeated the so-called immortal $npcName:23090005$ and caught a drop of his $item:30000419$. It hums with evil, and yet you can sense a great power within it. Perhaps $npcName:11000144$ can tell you more about it.

quest.name: Scholar of Life
quest.desc: $npcName:11000144$ isn't equipped to analyze the blood of an immortal monster. He recommends you seek out $npcName:11001210$ in $map:02000023$, who is a renowned scholar of life magic.
quest.complete: Talk to $npcName:11001210$ in $map:02000023$ and ask about $item:30000419$

quest.name: True Nature
quest.desc: $npcName:11001210$ is in a state of shock after discovering that the $item:30000419$ seemingly defies the laws of mortality. It is surely a source of great power... but it's useless to you if its evil can't be exorcised. Ask $npcName:11001210$ if he can purify it.

quest.name: Blacksmith of Nerman
quest.desc: $npcName:11001210$ purified the $item:30000419$, leaving only $item:30000420$ behind. He suggests you seek out Harcha the blacksmith in $map:02000203$, who may be able to forge it into a mighty weapon.

quest.name: Infinite Essence
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001211$'s great-grandfather, Harcha, passed down a technique to craft weapons the like of which Maple World has never seen. However, he needs $itemPlural:30000421$ and $itemPlural:30000420$ to do it.
You might be able to get $itemPlural:30000421$ from the Allicari in $map:2000064$.

quest.name: ボマールはウカウカに乗って
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001275$は、マカンが開発した飛行船ウカウカのテストが成功したと話した。 そして、ボマールがカルカルアイランドに位置するリザブ岩の島へ向かうウカウカに搭乗していると言うのであった。
$npc:11001275$は、$npcName:11001403$がバルボサ海岸に帰ってくるウカウカの整備を準備しているので、彼がミスをしないように飛行船作動マニュアルを渡してほしいと話した。 まずはウカウカに乗って$map:02010043$へ行き、$npcName:11001403$に会ってみるとしよう。
quest.complete: ウカウカに搭乗して$map:02010043$へ渡り、$npcName:11001403$に$item:30000486$を届ける

quest.name: 砂漠の女
quest.desc: $npcName:11001403$の話によれば、$npcName:11001405$は$npcName:11001404$という女に会うために$map:02010084$へ出発したという。 $map:02010084$の$npcName:11001404$に会えば、$npcName:11001405$の行方を知ることができそうだ。

quest.name: ルデリーシティへ
quest.desc: $npcName:11001404$は、$npcName:11001405$が$map:02010084$に訪ねてきたことは確かだが、急用のため$map:02010002$へ急いで出発したと話した。 $npcName:11001404$の話では、彼が出発して間もないとのことなので、今度こそ$map:02010002$へ行けば$npcName:11001405$を見つけることができそうだ。

quest.name: Donald's Invitation
quest.desc: $npcName:11003870$ has summoned you to $map:02000424$. Speak with $npcName:11000454$ in $map:02000069$ to get there.

quest.name: Stories of the Sea
quest.desc: Just when you thought $npcName:11000454$ was going to bore you to death with his endless stories, he told you that $npcName:11000981$ knows the route to $map:02000424$.

quest.name: To Berg Island
quest.desc: Since you're friends with $npcName:11000454$, $npcName:11000981$ has agreed to take you to $map:02000424$.

quest.name: Donald's Demand
quest.desc: $npcName:11003870$ of $map:02000424$ has a favor to ask of you. Deliver $item:30001128$ to the miners—but don't let them know who it's from!

quest.name: Always More Work
quest.desc: Just as you're about to return to $npcName:11003870$, $npc:11003871$ pulls you aside with another job.

quest.name: Always Welcome
quest.desc: $npcName:11003872$ thanks you and says to visit $map:02000424$ more often.

quest.name: Alkimi's Invitation
quest.desc: $npcName:11000005$ of the Alkimi Guild (a guild that—you guessed it—focuses on alchemy) has invited you to visit $map:02000425$. Meet with $npcName:11003876$ in $map:02000069$ to arrange your travel.

quest.name: Loana the Sailor
quest.desc: $npcName:11003876$ says that $map:02000425$ is a beautiful place.

quest.name: To Alkimi Island
quest.desc: $npcName:11003877$ opened the sea route to $map:02000425$.

quest.name: Lunch Delivery
quest.desc: $npcName:11003878$ forgot to send lunch to the caretaker of $map:02000425$. Deliver it on her behalf.

quest.name: Pulling Weeds
quest.desc: You need to get the lunch box back from $npcName:11003879$. $npcName:11003879$ asks you to pull weeds while he eats lunch.

quest.name: Thanks for the Meal
quest.desc: $npcName:11003879$ was able to have lunch in peace, thanks to you. Take the empty lunch box from $npcName:11003879$ and return it to $npcName:11003878$.
